content: I'd like to ping this PR of mine from last month which has seen no comments at all. Modulo any naming questions - I followed an analogy to Submodule.subtypeL - I think it's pretty straightforward. My motivation is from #24338 but I think this PR makes sense independently of that one.

They're both fine -- I merged the first one and delegated the second (which I thought was rather elegant -- you get a little extra without basically having to do too much -- it was wonderful to see the proofs still working after the definition changed). Thanks!
